page: WM69007: Planning And Design Of Water Engineering

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Design of water harvesting system; Efficiency of water supply system; Urban water resources: availability, improvement and efficient management; Optimal water allocation design; Design of quality control of water supply system (quality issues and measures); Climate change adoption measures for city water supply system; Water and development issues; Economic feasibility of water supply programs/projects; Clean water accessibility - case study; and Flood/drought damage - case study.
page: WM69007: Planning And Design Of Water Engineering
